ygData.subject: Re: to Korm
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok...I wasn t sure how all of Freeport worked....I got bound to the outside edge of West Freeport...and rarely go in anyhow...mostly so I could get bound
ygData.messageBody:
Ok...I wasn't sure how all of Freeport worked....I got bound to the
outside edge of West Freeport...and rarely go in anyhow...mostly so I
could get bound closer to ECom and WestCom. As for Grobb and Oggok.
Trolls and Dark Elves can't travel into Oggok completely safe. There are
Ogres that will KoS us...as weird as it sounds. I think between evil
race/class's Trolls and Dark Elves get along the best. From what I
understand they trust each other the most. I don't really like Ogre's
anyhow....so no skin off my back.

Korm
Cazic Thule
